name: GestationalDiabetes
title: Gestational Diabetes
description: This value set is undergoing testing. Use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes that represent  Gestational Diabetes),(Data Element Scope: ICD-10-CM codes that represent Gestational Diabetes),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set contains ICD-10-CM codes representing Gestational Diabetes during pregnancy, childbirth and the puerperium. Codes include Gestational Diabetes controlled by diet, insulin, oral hypoglycemic drugs, and unspecified control.),(Exclusion Criteria: Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus, steroid-induced Diabetes Mellitus, codes representing conditions occurring in infants born to a mother with Gestational Diabetes. Terminologies other than ICD-10-CM.)
